verses.text: Let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*. Make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* meeting \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* saints.

\w Let|strong="H1523"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w joy|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* maker; \w let|strong="H1523"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* their \w King|strong="H4428"\w*.

Let them give \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w his|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w dance|strong="H4234"\w*: let them \w make|strong="H8034"\w* melody \w to|strong="H8034"\w* him \w with|strong="H8034"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H8034"\w* brass \w and|strong="H8034"\w* corded instruments \w of|strong="H8034"\w* music.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w gives|strong="H3444"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H6035"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* spirit \w a|strong="H3588"\w* crown \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* saints \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w* \w and|strong="H7442"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* give \w cries|strong="H7442"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H3027"\w* high praises \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H0410"\w* mouths, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3027"\w* two-edged \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H0410"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*;

\w To|strong="H1471"\w* give \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* reward \w of|strong="H1471"\w* \w their|strong="H1471"\w* sins, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w* \w their|strong="H1471"\w* punishment;

\w To|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H0631"\w* \w their|strong="H3513"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w chains|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3513"\w* rulers \w in|strong="H4428"\w* bands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*;

\w To|strong="H4941"\w* give \w them|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* punishment \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H2623"\w* writings: \w this|strong="H1931"\w* honour \w is|strong="H1931"\w* given \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* saints. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*.
